alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 9:11AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Kern County through 1000 AM PST... At 910 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ridgecrest to near Rosamond. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Ridgecrest, Rosamond, California City, Edwards AFB, China Lake Acres, Randsburg, Inyokern, Mojave, Boron, Government Peak, Laurel Mountain and North Edwards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
